verses.text: After \w this|strong="H0376"\w* there \w went|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*; \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* wife \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* kindred.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* goodly \w child|strong="H1121"\w* \w hid|strong="H6845"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H3391"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w*, \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w basket|strong="H8392"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* bulrushes, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* daubed \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* slime \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w pitch|strong="H2203"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* little babe therein, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sedges \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* river’s brink,

\w His|strong="H3045"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w standing|strong="H3320"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* taking \w notice|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w would|strong="H4100"\w* be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Pharao \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w herself|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w river|strong="H2975"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w maids|strong="H5291"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* river’s brink. \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w she|strong="H1980"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w basket|strong="H8392"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sedges, \w she|strong="H1980"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w one|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w maids|strong="H5291"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w*,

She \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* infant \w crying|strong="H1058"\w*, having \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* babes \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w child’s|strong="H3206"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w Shall|strong="H0802"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* go \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* babe?

\w She|strong="H7121"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: Go. \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w maid|strong="H5959"\w* went \w and|strong="H6547"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* Pharao’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*. \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee thy \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*. \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w nursed|strong="H3243"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w*: \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w when|strong="H0802"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H0802"\w* grown \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, she \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Pharao’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* adopted \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w those|strong="H0376"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w grown|strong="H1431"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* affliction, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w striking|strong="H5221"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H0369"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w about|strong="H5221"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w way|strong="H3541"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H3541"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w next|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* quarrelling: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* wrong: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* strikest thou thy neighbour?

\w But|strong="H0859"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Who|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*? Wilt thou \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* thou didst yesterday \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*? \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w How|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* come \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* Pharao \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w but|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Madian, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Madian \w had|strong="H0001"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* draw \w water|strong="H8248"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* troughs \w were|strong="H1323"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w*, desired \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w drove|strong="H1644"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w away|strong="H1644"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* defending \w the|strong="H0853"\w* maids, \w watered|strong="H8248"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w returned|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Raguel \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* ye \w come|strong="H0935"\w* sooner than \w usual|strong="H3117"\w*?

\w They|strong="H0376"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w A|strong="H1571"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* drew \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w us|strong="H5337"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w*? \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w* let \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* go? \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* swore \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H0376"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*. \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* Sephora \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* wife:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w whom|strong="H7121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Gersam, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* another, \w whom|strong="H7121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Eliezer, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w*, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* helper hath \w delivered|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Pharao.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w groaning|strong="H0584"\w*, \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* works: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* works.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w groaning|strong="H5009"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w made|strong="H8085"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.
